data.scheme_name: Agriculture and Processed Foods Export Promotion Scheme of APEDA  - Market Development  - Assistance for New Market / Product Development  - Female  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides assistance of 75% of total cost up to Rs. 10 lakh for export promotion.
data.eligibility: All APEDA registered Exporters are eligible to apply for assistance.
data.conditions:
1. Quotation/proforma invoice on letterhead from reputed consultant clearly indicating the title of study, scope of work, cost, validity of quotation, payment terms etc. 
  2. The study proposed should not be a repetition of similar studies conducted in the past. 
  3. Clear justification for conducting proposed study should be provided.
data.beneficiaries: All APEDA registered Exporters are eligible to apply for assistance.
data.prerequisites:
1. Quotation/proforma invoice on letterhead from reputed consultant clearly indicating the title of study, scope of work, cost, validity of quotation, payment terms etc. 
  2. The study proposed should not be a repetition of similar studies conducted in the past. 
  3. Clear justification for conducting proposed study should be provided.
data.nodal_agency: Agricultural and Processed Foods Products Export Development Authority (APEDA)
data.context: This scheme is introduced for growth of agro-industries and export of agricultural products in the value chain. The scheme component covers both fresh produce and processed food products.
data.objective: The primary objective of APEDA is to undertake the development and promotion of export of mentioned products.
data.description: Scheme provides assistance of 75% of total cost up to Rs. 10 lakh for export promotion.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://apeda.gov.in/apedawebsite/miscellaneous/Tender.htm
data.funding_facilitator: Agricultural and Processed Foods Products Export Development Authority (APEDA)
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance amount shall be released to the beneficiary, direct in their account as per detail submitted in the application.
data.additional_info: APEDA shall charge processing fee as approved by the Department of Commerce (DoC), Ministry of Commerce and Industry, Government of India on disbursed amount which is presently 5% + GST as applicable.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. In-Principal Approval (IPA) issued by APEDA
2. PAN Card
3. Import Export Code
4. Registration-Cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) Certificate generated online
5. Quotation/proforma invoice /invoices from suppliers of equipment / packaging boxes/ advertisement /consultants (feasibility study/ISO/HACCP) etc.
6. Other relevant document (as required)
data.checklist_info_d:
